# SDALGCP
An R Package to make spatially continuous inference with spatially aggregated disease count

To install SDALGCP, you need to install the latest release of \code{bigstatsr} package first using
```{r}
devtools::install_github("privefl/bigstatsr")
```

then you can now install \code{SDALGCP} package using
```{r}
devtools::install_github("olatunjijohnson/SDALGCP")
```
